body:
Array equality test:

```
--- FAIL: TestGetPods (0.04s)
    <autogenerated>:31: 

    Error Trace:    rkt_test.go:502

    Error:      Not equal: []*container.Pod{(*container.Pod)(0xc820011f90), (*container.Pod)(0xc82037e000)} (expected)
                    != []*container.Pod{(*container.Pod)(0xc82037e0f0), (*container.Pod)(0xc82037e0a0)} (actual)

            Diff:
            --- Expected
            +++ Actual
            @@ -1,3 +1,42 @@
             ([]*container.Pod) (len=2 cap=2) {
            - (*container.Pod)(0xc820011f90)({
            + (*container.Pod)(0xc82037e0f0)({
            +  ID: (types.UID) (len=2) "43",
            +  Name: (string) (len=9) "guestbook",
            +  Namespace: (string) (len=7) "default",
            +  Containers: ([]*container.Container) (len=4 cap=4) {
            +   (*container.Container)(0xc820377aa0)({
            +    ID: (container.ContainerID) rkt://uuid-4003:app-11,
            +    Name: (string) (len=6) "app-11",
            +    Image: (string) (len=11) "img-name-11",
            +    Hash: (uint64) 10011,
            +    Created: (int64) 90000,
            +    State: (container.ContainerState) (len=6) "exited"
            +   }),
            +   (*container.Container)(0xc820377b00)({
            +    ID: (container.ContainerID) rkt://uuid-4003:app-22,
            +    Name: (string) (len=6) "app-22",
            +    Image: (string) (len=11) "img-name-22",
            +    Hash: (uint64) 10022,
            +    Created: (int64) 90000,
            +    State: (container.ContainerState) (len=6) "exited"
            +   }),
            +   (*container.Container)(0xc820377b60)({
            +    ID: (container.ContainerID) rkt://uuid-4004:app-11,
            +    Name: (string) (len=6) "app-11",
            +    Image: (string) (len=11) "img-name-11",
            +    Hash: (uint64) 10011,
            +    Created: (int64) 100000,
            +    State: (container.ContainerState) (len=7) "running"
            +   }),
            +   (*container.Container)(0xc820377bc0)({
            +    ID: (container.ContainerID) rkt://uuid-4004:app-22,
            +    Name: (string) (len=6) "app-22",
            +    Image: (string) (len=11) "img-name-22",
            +    Hash: (uint64) 10022,
            +    Created: (int64) 100000,
            +    State: (container.ContainerState) (len=7) "running"
            +   })
            +  }
            + }),
            + (*container.Pod)(0xc82037e0a0)({
               ID: (types.UID) (len=2) "42",
            @@ -6,3 +45,3 @@
               Containers: ([]*container.Container) (len=2 cap=2) {
            -   (*container.Container)(0xc8203776e0)({
            +   (*container.Container)(0xc8203779e0)({
                 ID: (container.ContainerID) rkt://uuid-4002:app-1,
            @@ -14,3 +53,3 @@
                }),
            -   (*container.Container)(0xc820377740)({
            +   (*container.Container)(0xc820377a40)({
                 ID: (container.ContainerID) rkt://uuid-4002:app-2,
            @@ -23,41 +62,2 @@
               }
            - }),
            - (*container.Pod)(0xc82037e000)({
            -  ID: (types.UID) (len=2) "43",
            -  Name: (string) (len=9) "guestbook",
            -  Namespace: (string) (len=7) "default",
            -  Containers: ([]*container.Container) (len=4 cap=4) {
            -   (*container.Container)(0xc8203777a0)({
            -    ID: (container.ContainerID) rkt://uuid-4003:app-11,
            -    Name: (string) (len=6) "app-11",
            -    Image: (string) (len=11) "img-name-11",
            -    Hash: (uint64) 10011,
            -    Created: (int64) 90000,
            -    State: (container.ContainerState) (len=6) "exited"
            -   }),
            -   (*container.Container)(0xc820377800)({
            -    ID: (container.ContainerID) rkt://uuid-4003:app-22,
            -    Name: (string) (len=6) "app-22",
            -    Image: (string) (len=11) "img-name-22",
            -    Hash: (uint64) 10022,
            -    Created: (int64) 90000,
            -    State: (container.ContainerState) (len=6) "exited"
            -   }),
            -   (*container.Container)(0xc820377860)({
            -    ID: (container.ContainerID) rkt://uuid-4004:app-11,
            -    Name: (string) (len=6) "app-11",
            -    Image: (string) (len=11) "img-name-11",
            -    Hash: (uint64) 10011,
            -    Created: (int64) 100000,
            -    State: (container.ContainerState) (len=7) "running"
            -   }),
            -   (*container.Container)(0xc8203778c0)({
            -    ID: (container.ContainerID) rkt://uuid-4004:app-22,
            -    Name: (string) (len=6) "app-22",
            -    Image: (string) (len=11) "img-name-22",
            -    Hash: (uint64) 10022,
            -    Created: (int64) 100000,
            -    State: (container.ContainerState) (len=7) "running"
            -   })
            -  }
              })

    Messages:   test case #2

```

Triggered in #22853 and #22851

cc @ncdc @yifan-gu
